About Us We have been in business for 20 years and counting.We have received great feedback ratings from customers. Our prices are lowest because we are the manufacturer and have removed the middlemen. We stock mostly all Items we list. Although many items are sold in “auction” format, we often have pieces available for instant purchase. We offer a full 30-day money back 100% satisfaction warranty on each item. We stand behind everything we sell. Shipping Orders will be shipped out within 5 business days after your payment has completed. Free Shipping 3 to 5 business days to United States (FedEx Express Saver) Free Shipping 1 to 10 business days to Worldwide (Economy Shipping) 7.99 3 to 5 business days to United Kingdom, Mexico, Germany France (FedEx International) 24.99 3 to 5 business days to worldwide (FedEx International) If you do not receive your order within the estimated delivery time, please contact us by message and we will gladly assist you. We have paid all postage before shipping, but for international buyers please be advised that import duties, taxes and charges are not included in the item nor shipping price. These charges are the buyer's responsibility; please check with your country's customs office to determine what these additional costs will be prior to making your purchase. Meanwhile, please tell us at the time of purchase if you have any special requests regarding the Customs declaration for your order. For instance, a particular name or value you would like on the package. Payment We accept PayPal only You can also pay using your credit card, via PayPal, by using PayPal as a guest. Terms of Sale All items will be checked and packed in good condition before shipping. If you are not happy with the item, you can return it in original condition and packaging within 30 days from the date received. Please email us first for return address and instructions. We offer money back or exchange for return. Buyers pay the return shipping. We will refund the amount once we receive the item. If you have any questions/complaints please feel free to contact us before leave feedback. You can leave us message at any time and we will try our best to solve the problem as soon as possible.
